fr.n7.stl.block.ast

Interface InstructionFactory

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BlockFactory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlockFactoryImpl

    public interface InstructionFactory
    Factory to create Abstract Syntax Tree nodes for common instructions in programming languages.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • createBlock

        Block createBlock()
        Create a root Block node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Returns:
        A Block node in the Abstract Syntax Tree. To be used to create the root of the instruction part in an Abstract Syntax Tree. Then the branches corresponding to the instruction in the block will be added using the add method from the Block interface.

      • createBlock

        Block createBlock(java.lang.Iterable<Instruction> _content)
        Create a root Block node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _content - Abstract Syntax Tree of the instructions contained in the block.
        Returns:
        A Block node in the Abstract Syntax Tree. To be used when the Abstract Syntax Tree of the branches are already available.

      • createBlock

        Block createBlock(Block _context)
        Create an embedded Block node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _context - Abstract Syntax Tree of the containing block.
        Returns:
        A Block node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.

      • createBlock

        Block createBlock(Block _context,
                  java.lang.Iterable<Instruction> _content)
        Create an embedded Block node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _context - Abstract Syntax Tree of the containing block.
        _content - Abstract Syntax Tree of the instructions contained in the block.
        Returns:
        A Block node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.

      • createConstantDeclaration

        ConstantDeclaration createConstantDeclaration(java.lang.String _name,
                                              Type _type,
                                              Expression _value)
        Create a constant declaration node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _name - Name of the declared constant.
        _type - Abstract Syntax Tree for the type of the declared constant.
        _value - Abstract Syntax Tree for the initial value of the declared constant.
        Returns:
        A Constant Declaration node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.

      • createVariableDeclaration

        VariableDeclaration createVariableDeclaration(java.lang.String _name,
                                              Type _type,
                                              Expression _value)
        Create a variable declaration node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _name - Name of the declared variable.
        _type - Abstract Syntax Tree for the type of the declared variable.
        _value - Abstract Syntax Tree for the initial value of the declared variable.
        Returns:
        A Variable Declaration node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.

      • createTypeDeclaration

        TypeDeclaration createTypeDeclaration(java.lang.String _name,
                                      Type _type)
        Create a type declaration node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _name - Name of the declared type.
        _type - Abstract Syntax Tree for the type associated to the name.
        Returns:
        A Type Declaration node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.

      • createAssignment

        Instruction createAssignment(VariableDeclaration _declaration,
                             Expression _value)
        Create an assignment node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _declaration - Variable Declaration node in the Abstract Syntax Tree corresponding to the assigned variable.
        _value - Abstract Syntax Tree for the expression whose value is assigned to the variable.
        Returns:
        An Assignment node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.

      • createAssignment

        Instruction createAssignment(Expression _assignable,
                             Expression _value)
        Create an assignment node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _assignable - Expression node in the Abstract Syntax Tree corresponding to the assignable part.
        _value - Abstract Syntax Tree for the expression whose value is assigned to the assignable part.
        Returns:
        An Assignment node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.

      • createConditional

        Instruction createConditional(Expression _condition,
                              Block _then,
                              Block _else)
        Create a conditional node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _condition - Expression node in the Abstract Syntax Tree whose value is used as condition in the evaluation of the conditional when the Conditional node is executed. This node is assigned to the Condition branch of the conditional node.
        _then - TAMInstruction node in the Abstract Syntax Tree that is executed if the condition value is true. This node is assigned to the Then branch of the Conditional node.
        _else - TAMInstruction node in the Abstract Syntax Tree that is executed if the condition value is false. This node is assigned to the Else branch of the Conditional node.
        Returns:
        A Conditional node in the Abstract Syntax Tree with both Then and Else branches.

      • createConditional

        Instruction createConditional(Expression _condition,
                              Block _then)
        Create a conditional node in the Abstract Syntax Tree with only the then part.
        Parameters:
        _condition - Expression node in the Abstract Syntax Tree whose value is used as condition in the evaluation of the conditional when the Conditional node is executed. This node is assigned to the Condition branch of the Conditional node.
        _then - TAMInstruction node in the Abstract Syntax Tree that is evaluated if the condition value is true. This node is assigned to the Then branch of the conditional node.
        Returns:
        A Conditional node in the Abstract Syntax Tree with only a Then branch.

      • createRepetition

        Instruction createRepetition(Expression _condition,
                             Block _body)
        Create a repetition node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _condition - Expression node in the Abstract Syntax Tree whose value is used as condition in the evaluation of the repetition when the Repetition node is executed. This node is assigned to the Condition branch of the Repetition node.
        _body - TAMInstruction node in the Abstract Syntax Tree that is evaluated if the condition value is true before repeating the repetition.
        Returns:
        A Repetition node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.

      • createPrinter

        Instruction createPrinter(Expression _value)
        Create a printer node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
        Parameters:
        _value - Expression node in the Abstract Syntax Tree whose value is printed when the Printer node is executed. This node is assigned to the Value branch of the Printer node.
        Returns:
        A Printer node in the Abstract Syntax Tree.
